title: How do I export contacts to other phones using the SIM card
answer:
Go to the contacts list, open the options menu and select Import/Export > Export to SIM card. Export the phone's contacts to the SIM card by following the on-screen prompts. 

 Next, insert the SIM card into the other phone. Go to the contacts list, open the options menu and select Import/Export > Import from SIM card. Import the SIM contacts to the phone by following the on-screen prompts.
keywords: SIM card, contacts, address book, import, export
